Main.Menu:
1| Create a new backup  
 2| Remove a backup  
 3| Start a backup  
 4| Start all available backup processes  
 5| View backup details  
 6| Exit

Save.Name: Enter the name of your save
Save.PathSave: Enter the path of the file to save
Save.PathDestination: Enter the path of the destination
Save.SaveType: Enter the type of save(0 : All files / 1 : Changed files)
Save.ErrorLimit: => Maximum number of backup processes reached, unable to create

Remove.Name: Enter the name of the backup to delete

StartSave.Name: Enter the name of the backup process to launch

AllProcess.EndProcess: => All backup processes have been launched correctly
AllProcess.Error: backup process could not be started
